returns.span: 如果找到该字符，则为 的从零开始的索引位置；如果未找到，则为 -1。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中，仅当字符的 Unicode 标量值相同时，才将其视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法搜索某个字符的 。The following example demonstrates how you can search a for a character using the method. [!code-cpp[System.String.IndexOf#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CPP/indexof_c.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp-interactive[System.String.IndexOf#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/indexof_c.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/indexof_c.vb#5)]

param.name: value
param.span: 要搜寻的字符串。

span.span: The string to seek.

summary.span: 报告指定字符串在此实例中的第一个匹配项的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Reports the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified string in this instance.

returns.span: 如果找到该字符串，则为 的从零开始的索引位置；如果未找到该字符串，则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based index position of if that string is found, or -1 if it is not.

returns.span: 如果 为 ，则返回值为 0。

span.span: If is , the return value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法使用当前区域性执行 word （区分大小写和区分区域性的）搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 搜索从该实例的第一个字符位置开始，并继续到最后一个字符的位置。The search begins at the first character position of this instance and continues until the last character position. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果 `value` 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回0（零），指示在当前实例的开头找到匹配项。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns 0 (zero) to indicate that the match is found at the beginning of the current instance. 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找两个字符串中的三个子字符串（软连字符（U + 00AD）、软连字符后跟 "n" 和软连字符后跟 "m"。In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen. 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，则在每种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，所以结果与 `value`中未包含软连字符的结果相同。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in each case, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the result is the same as if the soft hyphen had not been included in `value`. 仅搜索软连字符时，该方法返回0（零），指示它已在字符串的开头找到匹配项。When searching for a soft hyphen only, the method returns 0 (zero) to indicate that it has found a match at the beginning of the string. [!code-csharp[System.String.IndexOf#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/ignorable21.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/ignorable21.vb#21)] ## Examples 下面的示例在 "动物" 中搜索 "n"。The following example searches for the "n" in "animal". 由于字符串索引从零开始，而不是从零开始，因此 方法指示 "n" 位于位置1。Because string indexes begin at zero rather than one, the method indicates that the "n" is at position 1. [!code-cpp[System.String.IndexOf#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CPP/simple1.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp-interactive[System.String.IndexOf#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/simple1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/simple1.vb#12)] 下面的示例使用 方法来确定某一句子中动物名称的起始位置。The following example uses the method to determine the starting position of an animal name in a sentence. 然后，它将使用此位置插入描述动物的形容词。It then uses this position to insert an adjective that describes the animal into the sentence. [!code-cpp[stringinsert#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringinsert/CPP/stringinsert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[stringinsert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringinsert/CS/stringinsert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[stringinsert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringinsert/VB/stringinsert.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from 0. `startIndex` 参数可以介于 0 到字符串实例的长度。The `startIndex` parameter can range from 0 to the length of the string instance. 如果 `startIndex` 等于字符串实例的长度，则该方法将返回-1。If `startIndex` equals the length of the string instance, the method returns -1. 搜索范围从 `startIndex` 到字符串的末尾。The search ranges from `startIndex` to the end of the string. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中，仅当字符的 Unicode 标量值相同时，才将其视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法。The following example demonstrates the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. `comparisonType` 参数是一个 枚举成员，该成员指定对 `value` 参数的搜索是使用当前还是固定的区域性，区分大小写或不区分大小写，或者使用单词或序号比较规则。The `comparisonType` parameter is a enumeration member that specifies whether the search for the `value` argument uses the current or invariant culture, is case-sensitive or case-insensitive, or uses word or ordinal comparison rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from 0. `startIndex` 参数可以介于 0 到字符串实例的长度。The `startIndex` parameter can range from 0 to the length of the string instance. 如果 `startIndex` 等于字符串实例的长度，则该方法将返回-1。If `startIndex` equals the length of the string instance, the method returns -1. 此方法使用当前区域性执行 word （区分大小写和区分区域性的）搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 搜索从该实例的 `startIndex` 字符位置开始，并继续到最后一个字符的位置。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and continues until the last character position. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果 `value` 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 `startIndex`，这是搜索开始处的字符位置。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns `startIndex`, which is the character position at which the search begins. 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找软连字符的位置（U + 00AD），后跟两个字符串中的 "m"。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，该方法将返回字符串中的 "m" 的索引。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string. 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m". [!code-csharp[System.String.IndexOf#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/CS/ignorable22.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.String.IndexOf#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.IndexOf/VB/ignorable22.vb#22)] ## Examples 下面的示例在目标字符串中搜索指定字符串的所有匹配项。The following example searches for all occurrences of a specified string within a target string. para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

para.span: 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找两个字符串中的三个子字符串（软连字符（U + 00AD）、软连字符后跟 "n" 和软连字符后跟 "m"。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

para.span: 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，因为软连字符是可忽略的字符，所以区分区域性的搜索返回的值与在搜索字符串中未包含软连字符时返回的值相同。

span.span: If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the same value that it would return if the soft hyphen were not included in the search string.

para.span: 不过，序号搜索成功地在一个字符串中查找软连字符，并报告从第二个字符串中缺少它。

span.span: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

span.span: As explained in [Best Practices for Using Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings), we recommend that you avoid calling string comparison methods that substitute default values and instead call methods that require parameters to be explicitly specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from 0. `startIndex` 参数可以介于 0 到字符串实例的长度。The `startIndex` parameter can range from 0 to the length of the string instance. 如果 `startIndex` 等于字符串实例的长度，则该方法将返回-1。If `startIndex` equals the length of the string instance, the method returns -1. `comparisonType` 参数通过使用区分大小写或不区分大小写的搜索以及使用 word 或序号比较规则，指定搜索使用当前或固定区域性的 `value` 参数。The `comparisonType` parameter specifies to search for the `value` parameter using the current or invariant culture, using a case-sensitive or case-insensitive search, and using word or ordinal comparison rules. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的三个重载，该方法使用 枚举的不同值在另一个字符串内查找字符串的第一个匹配项。The following example demonstrates three overloads of the method that find the first occurrence of a string within another string using different values of the enumeration. para.span: 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 ，这是搜索开始处的字符位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找软连字符（U + 00AD）后跟 "m" 的位置（从两个字符串中的第三个字符位置开始）。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting with the third character position in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，则在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，所以当执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法将返回字符串中的 "m" 的索引。

span.span: If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".

para.span: 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 ，这是搜索开始处的字符位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找软连字符（U + 00AD）后跟 "m" 的位置，该位置从两个字符串中的第三个到第六个字符位置开始。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" starting in the third through sixth character positions in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 搜索 `anyOf` 区分大小写。The search for `anyOf` is case-sensitive. 如果 `anyOf` 为空数组，该方法将在字符串的开头找到匹配项（即索引为零）。If `anyOf` is an empty array, the method finds a match at the beginning of the string (that is, at index zero). 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中，仅当字符的 Unicode 标量值相同时，才将其视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找字符串中的第一个元音。The following example finds the first vowel in a string. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.IndexOfAny/cs/IndexOfAny1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.IndexOfAny/vb/IndexOfAny1.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. `startIndex` 参数的范围可以介于0到字符串实例的长度之间。The `startIndex` parameter can range from 0 to one less than the length of the string instance. 搜索范围从 `startIndex` 到字符串的末尾。The search ranges from `startIndex` to the end of the string. 搜索 `anyOf` 区分大小写。The search for `anyOf` is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中字符仅在其 Unicode 标量值相同时才被视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar value are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找字符串 "is" 在另一个字符串的子字符串中的匹配项的索引。The following example finds the index of the occurrence of any character of the string "is" within a substring of another string. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.indexofany2/CPP/ixany2.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.indexofany2/CS/ixany2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.indexofany2/VB/ixany2.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索从 `startIndex` 开始，并继续 + `count`-1 `startIndex`。The search begins at `startIndex` and continues to `startIndex` + `count` -1. 搜索中不包括 `startIndex` + `count` 的字符。The character at `startIndex` + `count` is not included in the search. 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. `startIndex` 参数的范围可以介于0到字符串实例的长度之间。The `startIndex` parameter can range from 0 to one less than the length of the string instance. 搜索 `anyOf` 区分大小写。The search for `anyOf` is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中字符仅在其 Unicode 标量值相同时才被视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar value are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找字符串 "辅助" 的任何字符在另一个字符串的子字符串中的匹配项的索引。The following example finds the index of the occurrence of any character of the string "aid" within a substring of another string. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.indexofany3/CPP/ixany3.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.indexofany3/CS/ixany3.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.indexofany3/VB/ixany3.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `startIndex` 等于此实例的长度，则 `value` 将追加到此实例的末尾。If `startIndex` is equal to the length of this instance, `value` is appended to the end of this instance. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会修改当前实例的值。This method does not modify the value of the current instance. 相反，它会返回一个新字符串，其中 `value` 插入到当前实例中。Instead, it returns a new string in which `value` is inserted into the current instance. 例如，`"abc".Insert(2, "XYZ")` 的返回值为 "abXYZc"。For example, the return value of `"abc".Insert(2, "XYZ")` is "abXYZc". ## Examples 下面的示例在字符串的第四个字符位置（索引3处的字符）插入一个空格字符。The following example inserts a space character in the fourth character position (the character at index 3) of a string. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Insert/cs/Insert1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.String.Insert/vb/Insert1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 以下控制台应用程序将提示用户输入一个或多个形容词来描述两个动物。The following console application prompts the users to enter one or more adjectives to describe two animals. 然后，它调用 方法，将用户输入的文本插入到字符串中。It then calls the method to insert the text entered by the user into a string. Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: str
param.span: 要在暂存池中搜索的字符串。

span.span: A string to search for in the intern pool.

summary.span: 检索系统对指定 的引用。

span.span: Retrieves the system's reference to the specified .

returns.span: 如果暂存了 ，则返回系统对其的引用；否则返回对值为 的字符串的新引用。

span.span: The system's reference to , if it is interned; otherwise, a new reference to a string with the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时通过维护名为拘留池的表来节省字符串存储，该表包含对程序中以编程方式声明或创建的每个唯一文本字符串的单个引用。The common language runtime conserves string storage by maintaining a table, called the intern pool, that contains a single reference to each unique literal string declared or created programmatically in your program. 因此，系统中仅存在一个具有特定值的文本字符串的实例。Consequently, an instance of a literal string with a particular value only exists once in the system. 例如，如果将相同的文本字符串分配给几个变量，则运行时将从暂存池中检索到文本字符串的相同引用，并将其分配给每个变量。For example, if you assign the same literal string to several variables, the runtime retrieves the same reference to the literal string from the intern pool and assigns it to each variable. 方法使用拘留池搜索等于 `str`值的字符串。The method uses the intern pool to search for a string equal to the value of `str`. 如果存在这样的字符串，则返回暂存池中的引用。If such a string exists, its reference in the intern pool is returned. 如果该字符串不存在，则会将对 `str` 的引用添加到拘留池中，然后返回该引用。If the string does not exist, a reference to `str` is added to the intern pool, then that reference is returned. 在下面的示例中，已暂存值为 "MyTest" 的字符串 s1，因为它是程序中的文本。In the following example, the string s1, which has a value of "MyTest", is already interned because it is a literal in the program. 类将生成一个与 s1 具有相同值的新字符串对象。The class generates a new string object that has the same value as s1. 对该字符串的引用将分配给 s2。A reference to that string is assigned to s2. 方法搜索与 s2 具有相同值的字符串。The method searches for a string that has the same value as s2. 由于存在这样的字符串，因此该方法将返回分配给 s1 的相同引用。Because such a string exists, the method returns the same reference that is assigned to s1. 然后，将该引用分配给 s3。That reference is then assigned to s3. 引用 s1 和 s2 比较不相等，因为它们引用不同的对象;引用 s1 和 s3 比较相等，因为它们引用相同的字符串。References s1 and s2 compare unequal because they refer to different objects; references s1 and s3 compare equal because they refer to the same string. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Intern/cs/Intern1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet-method" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Intern/vb/Intern1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: 将此方法与 方法进行比较。Compare this method to the method. ## 版本注意事项Version considerations 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)]中， 方法会恢复到其在 .NET Framework 1.0 和1.1 中的行为，这与用于暂存空字符串有关。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], the method reverts to its behavior in the .NET Framework 1.0 and 1.1 with regard to interning the empty string. 在下面的示例中，为变量 `str1` 分配了对 的引用，并且为变量 `str2` 分配了对 的引用，该引用在将其值 为 对象的 对象转换为字符串后返回。In the following example, the variable `str1` is assigned a reference to , and the variable `str2` is assigned the reference to that is returned by calling the method after converting a object whose value is to a string. 然后，比较 `str1` 和 `str2` 中包含的引用是否相等。Then the references contained in `str1` and `str2` are compared for equality. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Intern/cs/Intern2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet-method" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Intern/vb/Intern2.vb" id="Snippet2"::: 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[net_v30_long](~/includes/net-v30-long-md.md)]中，`str1` 和 `str2` 不相等。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v30_long](~/includes/net-v30-long-md.md)], `str1` and `str2` are not equal. 在所有其他版本中，`str1` 和 `str2` 相等。In all other versions, `str1` and `str2` are equal. ## 性能注意事项Performance Considerations 如果尝试减少应用程序分配的内存总量，请记住，暂存字符串具有两个不需要的副作用。If you are trying to reduce the total amount of memory your application allocates, keep in mind that interning a string has two unwanted side effects. 首先，在公共语言运行时（CLR）终止之前，为暂存 对象分配的内存不大可能被释放。First, the memory allocated for interned objects is not likely to be released until the common language runtime (CLR) terminates. 原因在于，CLR 对暂存 对象的引用可在应用程序（甚至应用程序域）终止后保持。The reason is that the CLR's reference to the interned object can persist after your application, or even your application domain, terminates. 其次，若要暂存字符串，必须先创建字符串。Second, to intern a string, you must first create the string. 即使将最终回收内存，也仍必须分配 对象使用的内存。The memory used by the object must still be allocated, even though the memory will eventually be garbage collected. .NET Framework 版本2.0 引入了 的枚举成员。The .NET Framework version 2.0 introduces the enumeration member. 成员将程序集标记为不需要字符串的暂留。The member marks an assembly as not requiring string-literal interning. 您可以使用 属性将 应用于程序集。You can apply to an assembly using the attribute. 此外，当你使用[ngen.exe （本机映像生成器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator)在运行时提前编译程序集时，不会在模块之间暂存字符串。Also, when you use the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator) to compile an assembly in advance of run time, strings are not interned across modules. ## Examples 下面的示例使用三个相同值的字符串来确定新创建的字符串和暂存的字符串是否相等。The following example uses three strings that are equal in value to determine whether a newly created string and an interned string are equal. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.intern/CPP/string_intern.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.intern/CS/string_intern.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.intern/VB/string_intern.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共语言运行时自动维护一个名为拘留池的表，该表包含在程序中声明的每个唯一文本字符串常量的单个实例，以及通过调用 方法以编程方式添加的任何 的唯一实例。The common language runtime automatically maintains a table, called the intern pool, which contains a single instance of each unique literal string constant declared in a program, as well as any unique instance of you add programmatically by calling the method. 拘留池节省了字符串存储。The intern pool conserves string storage. 如果将文本字符串常量分配给几个变量，则每个变量将设置为引用拘留池中的同一常量，而不是引用具有相同值的 的多个不同实例。If you assign a literal string constant to several variables, each variable is set to reference the same constant in the intern pool instead of referencing several different instances of that have identical values. 此方法查找暂存池中的 `str`。This method looks up `str` in the intern pool. 如果已暂存 `str`，则返回对该实例的引用;否则，将返回 `null`。If `str` has already been interned, a reference to that instance is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 将此方法与 方法进行比较。Compare this method to the method. 此方法不返回布尔值。This method does not return a Boolean value. 如果调用方法，因为您需要一个指示是否暂存特定字符串的布尔值，则可以使用如下所示的代码。If you call the method because you want a Boolean value that indicates whether a particular string is interned, you can use code such as the following. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isinterned/cs/isinternedex1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isinterned/vb/isinternedex1.vb" id="Snippet1"::: > [!NOTE] > 从 .NET Framework 版本2.0 开始，当你使用[ngen.exe （本机映像生成器）](/dotnet/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator)将程序集安装到本地计算机上的本机映像缓存时，你可以重写拘留池的使用。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can override the use of the intern pool when you use the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator) to install an assembly to the native image cache on a local computer. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "备注" 部分中 属性的性能注意事项。For more information, see Performance Considerations in the Remarks section for the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了编译器自动暂存文本字符串。The following example demonstrates that literal strings are interned automatically by the compiler. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isinterned/CPP/isin.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isinterned/CS/isin.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isinterned/VB/isin.vb" id="Snippet1":::

summary.span: 指示此字符串是否符合 Unicode 范式 C。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 Unicode 字符具有多个等效的二进制表示形式，其中包含组合和/或复合 Unicode 字符的集合。Some Unicode characters have multiple equivalent binary representations consisting of sets of combining and/or composite Unicode characters. 单个字符存在多个表示形式会使搜索、排序、匹配和其他操作复杂化。The existence of multiple representations for a single character complicates searching, sorting, matching, and other operations. Unicode 标准定义了一个名为规范化的进程，该进程在给定任何等效的二进制表示形式的字符时返回一个二进制表示形式。The Unicode standard defines a process called normalization that returns one binary representation when given any of the equivalent binary representations of a character. 可以通过多个算法（称为标准化形式）来执行规范化，它们遵循不同的规则。Normalization can be performed with several algorithms, called normalization forms, that obey different rules. .NET 当前支持范式 C、D、GLM-KC-QNW 和 KD。.NET currently supports normalization forms C, D, KC, and KD. 有关支持的 Unicode 范式的说明，请参阅 。For a description of supported Unicode normalization forms, see . ## Examples 下面的示例确定字符串是否已成功规范化为各种范式。The following example determines whether a string is successfully normalized to various normalization forms. [!code-cpp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CPP/norm.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CS/norm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/VB/norm.vb#1)]

para.span: 因此，如果字符串包含非规范化字符后跟无效的 Unicode 字符，则 方法将引发 ，不过 返回 。

span.span: Therefore, if a string contains non-normalized characters followed by invalid Unicode characters, the method will throw an although returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种简便方法，使您能够同时测试 是否 `null` 或其值是否 。 is a convenience method that enables you to simultaneously test whether a is `null` or its value is . 它等效于以下代码：It is equivalent to the following code: [!code-cpp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cpp/isnullorempty1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp-interactive[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cs/isnullorempty1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/vb/isnullorempty1.vb#1)] 您可以使用 方法来测试是否 `null`字符串、是否 其值，或者它是否仅包含空白字符。You can use the method to test whether a string is `null`, its value is , or it consists only of white-space characters. ## 什么是空字符串？What is a null string? 如果未为其分配值（在和 Visual Basic 中C++ ），或者如果已显式为其分配了值 `null`，则 `null` 字符串。A string is `null` if it has not been assigned a value (in C++ and Visual Basic) or if it has explicitly been assigned a value of `null`. 尽管[复合格式设置](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting)功能可以适当地处理空字符串（如下面的示例所示），但如果其成员引发 ，则尝试调用它。Although the [composite formatting](/dotnet/standard/base-types/composite-formatting) feature can gracefully handle a null string, as the following example shows, attempting to call one if its members throws a . [!code-cpp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cpp/NullString1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp-interactive[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cs/NullString1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/vb/NullString1.vb#2)] ## 什么是空字符串？What is an empty string? 如果字符串显式分配了空字符串（""）或 ，则该字符串为空。A string is empty if it is explicitly assigned an empty string ("") or . 空字符串的 为0。An empty string has a of 0. 下面的示例创建一个空字符串并显示其值和它的长度。The following example creates an empty string and displays its value and its length. [!code-cpp[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cpp/NullString1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp-interactive[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/cs/NullString1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.String.IsNullOrEmpty#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorempty/vb/NullString1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下面的示例检查三个字符串，确定每个字符串是否有值、是否为空字符串或是否 `null`。The following example examines three strings and determines whether each string has a value, is an empty string, or is `null`. [!code-cpp[String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isNullOrEmpty/CPP/inoe.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp-interactive[String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isNullOrEmpty/CS/inoe.cs#1)] [!code-vb[String.IsNullOrEmpty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.isNullOrEmpty/VB/inoe.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种简便的方法，类似于下面的代码，但它提供了优异的性能： is a convenience method that is similar to the following code, except that it offers superior performance: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorwhitespace/cs/isnullorwhitespace.cs" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorwhitespace/vb/isnullorwhitespace.vb" id="Snippet2"::: 空白字符由 Unicode 标准定义。White-space characters are defined by the Unicode standard. 当将值作为空白字符传递到 方法时， 方法解释返回值 `true` 的任何字符。The method interprets any character that returns a value of `true` when it is passed to the method as a white-space character. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个字符串数组，然后将数组的每个元素传递到 方法。The following example creates a string array, and then passes each element of the array to the method. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorwhitespace/cs/isnullorwhitespace1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.isnullorwhitespace/vb/isnullorwhitespace1.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `null``separator`，则改为使用空字符串（）。If `separator` is `null`, an empty string () is used instead. 如果 `null``values` 的任何成员，则改为使用空字符串。If any member of `values` is `null`, an empty string is used instead. 是一种简便方法，使你可以连接 `IEnumerable(Of String)` 集合中的每个元素，而无需先将元素转换为字符串数组。 is a convenience method that lets you concatenate each element in an `IEnumerable(Of String)` collection without first converting the elements to a string array. 它对语言集成查询（LINQ）查询表达式特别有用。It is particularly useful with Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) query expressions. 下面的示例将包含字母表的大写或小写字母的 `List(Of String)` 对象传递到 lambda 表达式，该表达式选择等于或大于特定字母的字母（在本例中为 "M"）。The following example passes a `List(Of String)` object that contains either the uppercase or lowercase letters of the alphabet to a lambda expression that selects letters that are equal to or greater than a particular letter (which, in the example, is "M"). 方法返回的 `IEnumerable(Of String)` 集合会传递到 方法，以单个字符串的形式显示结果。The `IEnumerable(Of String)` collection returned by the method is passed to the method to display the result as a single string. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/cs/join4.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet4"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/vb/join4.vb" id="Snippet4"::: ## Examples 下面的示例使用埃拉托色 of 尼斯筛法算法来计算小于或等于100的质数。The following example uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes algorithm to calculate the prime numbers that are less than or equal to 100. 它将结果分配给类型 的 对象，然后将其传递给 方法。It assigns the result to a object of type , which it then passes to the method. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/cs/join3.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet3"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/vb/join3.vb" id="Snippet3":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `separator` `null` 或者第一个元素 `values` 之外的任何元素 `null`，则改用空字符串（）。If `separator` is `null` or if any element of `values` other than the first element is `null`, an empty string () is used instead. 如果 `null``values` 的第一个元素，请参阅 "调用方的说明" 部分。See the Notes for Callers section if the first element of `values` is `null`. 是一种简便方法，可让你连接对象数组中的每个元素，而无需将其元素显式转换为字符串。 is a convenience method that lets you concatenate each element in an object array without explicitly converting its elements to strings. 数组中每个对象的字符串表示形式都是通过调用该对象的 `ToString` 方法派生的。The string representation of each object in the array is derived by calling that object's `ToString` method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用埃拉托色 of 尼斯筛法算法来计算小于或等于100的质数。The following example uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes algorithm to calculate the prime numbers that are less than or equal to 100. 它将结果分配给一个整数数组，然后将结果传递给 方法。It assigns the result to a integer array, which it then passes to the method. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/cs/join1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/vb/join1.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果 `separator` 为 "，" 并且 `value` 的元素为 "apple"、"橙色"、"grape" 和 "梨"，`Join(separator, value)` 将返回 "apple，橙色，grape，梨"。For example, if `separator` is ", " and the elements of `value` are "apple", "orange", "grape", and "pear", `Join(separator, value)` returns "apple, orange, grape, pear". 如果 `null``separator`，则改为使用空字符串（）。If `separator` is `null`, an empty string () is used instead. 如果 `null``value` 中的任何元素，则改为使用空字符串。If any element in `value` is `null`, an empty string is used instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法。The following example demonstrates the method. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringjoin/CPP/stringjoin.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringjoin/CS/stringjoin.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/stringjoin/VB/stringjoin.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果 `separator` 为 "，" 且 `value` 的元素为 "apple"、"橙色"、"grape" 和 "梨"，`Join(separator, value, 1, 2)` 将返回 "橙色，grape"。For example, if `separator` is ", " and the elements of `value` are "apple", "orange", "grape", and "pear", `Join(separator, value, 1, 2)` returns "orange, grape". 如果 `null``separator`，则改为使用空字符串（）。If `separator` is `null`, an empty string () is used instead. 如果 `null``value` 中的任何元素，则改为使用空字符串。If any element in `value` is `null`, an empty string is used instead. ## Examples 下面的示例连接水果名称数组中的两个元素。The following example concatenates two elements from an array of names of fruit. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `null``separator`，则改为使用空字符串（）。If `separator` is `null`, an empty string () is used instead. 如果 `null``values` 的任何成员，则改为使用空字符串。If any member of `values` is `null`, an empty string is used instead. 是一种简便方法，使你可以连接 集合的每个成员，无需先将其转换为字符串。 is a convenience method that lets you concatenate each member of an collection without first converting them to strings. 集合中每个对象的字符串表示形式是通过调用该对象的 `ToString` 方法派生的。The string representation of each object in the collection is derived by calling that object's `ToString` method. 此方法对语言集成查询（LINQ）查询表达式特别有用。This method is particular useful with Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) query expressions. 例如，下面的代码定义了一个非常简单的 `Animal` 类，该类包含动物的名称以及其所属的顺序。For example, the following code defines a very simple `Animal` class that contains the name of an animal and the order to which it belongs. 然后，它定义包含多个 `Animal` 对象的 对象。It then defines a object that contains a number of `Animal` objects. 调用 扩展方法以提取其 `Order` 属性等于 "啮齿类" 的 `Animal` 对象。The extension method is called to extract the `Animal` objects whose `Order` property equals "Rodent". 结果传递给 方法。The result is passed to the method. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/cs/join5.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet5"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/vb/join5.vb" id="Snippet5"::: ## Examples 下面的示例使用埃拉托色 of 尼斯筛法算法来计算小于或等于100的质数。The following example uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes algorithm to calculate the prime numbers that are less than or equal to 100. 它将结果分配给类型为 integer 的 对象，然后将其传递给 方法。It assigns the result to a object of type integer, which it then passes to the method. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/cs/join2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.join/vb/join2.vb" id="Snippet2":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 此方法从该实例的最后一个字符位置开始搜索，然后在找到 `value` 找到或检查了第一个字符位置之后，再向后移动。This method begins searching at the last character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 搜索区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中，仅当字符的 Unicode 标量值相同时，才将其视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个 `ExtractFilename` 方法，该方法使用 方法查找字符串中的最后一个目录分隔符字符并提取字符串的文件名。The following example defines an `ExtractFilename` method that uses the method to find the last directory separator character in a string and to extract the string's file name. 如果文件存在，则方法将返回文件名，而不返回其路径。If the file exists, the method returns the file name without its path. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 此搜索从该实例的最后一个字符位置开始，并在找到 `value` 找到或检查了第一个字符位置之前继续向后定位。The search begins at the last character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 此方法使用当前区域性执行 word （区分大小写和区分区域性的）搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果 `value` 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 -1，表示当前实例中的最后一个索引位置。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns - 1, which represents the last index position in the current instance. 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找两个字符串中的三个子字符串（软连字符（U + 00AD）、软连字符后跟 "n" 和软连字符后跟 "m"。In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings. 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen. 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，则在每种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，所以结果与 `value`中未包含软连字符的结果相同。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in each case, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the result is the same as if the soft hyphen had not been included in `value`. 仅搜索软连字符时，该方法返回6和5。When searching for a soft hyphen only, the method returns 6 and 5. 这些值对应于两个字符串中最后一个字符的索引。These values correspond to the index of the last character in the two strings. [!code-csharp[System.String.LastIndexOf#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/cs/lastindexof21.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.String.LastIndexOf#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/vb/lastindexof21.vb#21)] ## Examples 下面的示例在标记开始和结束字符串时，删除字符串中的开始和关闭 HTML 标记。The following example removes opening and closing HTML tags from a string if the tags begin and end the string. 如果字符串以右括号字符（">"）结尾，则该示例使用 方法查找结束标记的开头。If a string ends with a closing bracket character (">"), the example uses the method to locate the start of the end tag. [!code-csharp[System.String.LastIndexOf#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/cs/lastindexof_example2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.String.LastIndexOf#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/vb/lastindexof_example2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 此方法从该实例的 `startIndex` 字符位置开始搜索，并沿当前实例的开头向后移动，直到找到 `value` 或已检查第一个字符位置。This method begins searching at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning of the current instance until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 例如，如果 `startIndex` 为-1，则该方法会搜索字符串中最后一个字符的每个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches every character from the last character in the string to the beginning. 搜索区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中，仅当字符的 Unicode 标量值相同时，才将其视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找字符串中出现的所有字符的索引，该索引从字符串的末尾到字符串的开头。The following example finds the index of all occurrences of a character in a string, working from the end of the string to the start of the string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 搜索将从该实例的 `startIndex` 字符位置开始，并在 `value` 找到或检查了第一个字符位置之前向后继续。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 例如，如果 `startIndex` 为-1，则该方法会搜索字符串中最后一个字符的每个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches every character from the last character in the string to the beginning. 此方法使用当前区域性执行 word （区分大小写和区分区域性的）搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果 `value` 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 `startIndex`，这是搜索开始处的字符位置。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns `startIndex`, which is the character position at which the search begins. 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找包含软连字符（U + 00AD）并且在字符串中之前或包含最终 "m" 的子字符串。In the following example, the method is used to find a substring that includes a soft hyphen (U+00AD) and that precedes or includes the final "m" in a string. 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，则将忽略搜索字符串中的软连字符，并调用方法以查找由软连字符和 "m" 组成的子字符串，并将 "m" 的位置返回到字符串中，而调用该方法可查找由软连字符组成的子字符串，"n" 将返回 "n" 的位置。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, because the soft hyphen in the search string is ignored, calling the method to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "m" returns the position of the "m" in the string, whereas calling it to find a substring that consists of the soft hyphen and "n" returns the position of the "n". 如果搜索字符串只包含软连字符，则方法返回 "m" 的索引，它表示 `startIndex`的值。When the search string contains only the soft hyphen, the method returns the index of the "m", which represents the value of `startIndex`. [!code-csharp[System.String.LastIndexOf#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/cs/lastindexof22.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.String.LastIndexOf#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/vb/lastindexof22.vb#22)] ## Examples 下面的示例查找目标字符串中字符串的所有匹配项的索引，从目标字符串的末尾到目标字符串的开头。The following example finds the index of all occurrences of a string in target string, working from the end of the target string to the start of the target string. [!code-cpp[string.lastindexof7#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOf7/CPP/lastixof7.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.lastindexof7#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOf7/CS/lastixof7.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.lastindexof7#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOf7/VB/lastixof7.vb#1)]

para.span: 如[使用字符串的最佳做法](/dotnet/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings)中所述，建议你避免调用替换默认值的字符串比较方法，并改为调用需要显式指定参数的方法。

span.span: As explained in [Best Practices for Using Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/best-practices-strings), we recommend that you avoid calling string comparison methods that substitute default values and instead call methods that require parameters to be explicitly specified.

para.span: 若要通过使用当前区域性的比较规则查找特定字符位置之前的子字符串的索引，请使用其 参数的值 调用 方法重载。

span.span: To find the index of a substring that precedes a particular character position by using the comparison rules of the current culture, call the method overload with a value of for its parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. `comparisonType` 参数通过使用区分大小写或不区分大小写的搜索以及使用 word 或序号比较规则，指定搜索使用当前或固定区域性的 `value` 参数。The `comparisonType` parameter specifies to search for the `value` parameter using the current or invariant culture, using a case-sensitive or case-insensitive search, and using word or ordinal comparison rules. 此搜索从该实例的最后一个字符位置开始，并在找到 `value` 找到或检查了第一个字符位置之前继续向后定位。The search begins at the last character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的三个重载，该方法使用 枚举的不同值在另一个字符串内查找字符串的最后一个匹配项。The following example demonstrates three overloads of the method that find the last occurrence of a string within another string using different values of the enumeration. span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 -1，表示当前实例中的最后一个索引位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns - 1, which represents the last index position in the current instance.

para.span: 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找两个字符串中的三个子字符串（软连字符（U + 00AD）、软连字符后跟 "n" 和软连字符后跟 "m"。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find three substrings (a soft hyphen (U+00AD), a soft hyphen followed by "n", and a soft hyphen followed by "m") in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含软连字符。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains a soft hyphen.

para.span: 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，因为软连字符是可忽略的字符，所以区分区域性的搜索返回的值与在搜索字符串中未包含软连字符时返回的值相同。

span.span: If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, a culture-sensitive search returns the same value that it would return if the soft hyphen were not included in the search string.

para.span: 不过，序号搜索成功地在一个字符串中查找软连字符，并报告从第二个字符串中缺少它。

span.span: An ordinal search, however, successfully finds the soft hyphen in one string and reports that it is absent from the second string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 此方法从 `startIndex` 字符位置开始搜索，并沿此实例的开头向后前进，直到找到 `value` 或已检查 `count` 字符位置。This method begins searching at the `startIndex` character position and proceeds backward toward the beginning of this instance until either `value` is found or `count` character positions have been examined. 例如，如果 `startIndex` 为-1，则该方法将向后搜索 `count` 字符串中的最后一个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches backward `count` characters from the last character in the string. 搜索区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中字符仅在其 Unicode 标量值相同时才被视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar value are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找子字符串中某个字符的所有匹配项的索引，该索引从子字符串的末尾到子字符串的开头。The following example finds the index of all occurrences of a character in a substring, working from the end of the substring to the start of the substring. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 搜索将从该实例的 `startIndex` 字符位置开始，并在 `value` 找到或已检查 `count` 个字符位置时向后继续。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either `value` is found or `count` character positions have been examined. 例如，如果 `startIndex` 为-1，则该方法将向后搜索 `count` 字符串中的最后一个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches backward `count` characters from the last character in the string. 此方法使用当前区域性执行 word （区分大小写和区分区域性的）搜索。This method performs a word (case-sensitive and culture-sensitive) search using the current culture. 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison. 在区分区域性的搜索中，如果 `value` 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。In a culture-sensitive search, if `value` contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed. 如果 `value` 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 `startIndex`，这是搜索开始处的字符位置。If `value` consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns `startIndex`, which is the character position at which the search begins. 在下面的示例中，使用 方法来查找两个字符串中 "m" 前面的两个字符中的软连字符（U + 00AD）的位置。In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) in the two characters that precede the final "m" of two strings. 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。Only one of the strings contains the required substring. 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，则在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，所以当执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法将返回字符串中的 "m" 的索引。If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison. 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m". [!code-csharp[System.String.LastIndexOf#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/cs/lastindexof23.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.String.LastIndexOf#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.LastIndexOf/vb/lastindexof23.vb#23)] ## Examples 下面的示例查找子字符串中字符串的所有匹配项的索引（从子字符串的末尾到子字符串的开头）。The following example finds the index of all occurrences of a string in substring, working from the end of the substring to the start of the substring. summary.span: 一个参数指定要执行搜索指定字符串的比较类型。

span.span: A parameter specifies the type of comparison to perform when searching for the specified string.

returns.span: 如果找到该字符串，则为 参数的从零开始的起始索引位置；如果未找到该字符串或当前实例等于 ，则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based starting index position of the parameter if that string is found, or -1 if it is not found or if the current instance equals .

returns.span: 如果 为 ，则返回值为 和此实例中的最后一个索引位置中的较小者。

span.span: If is , the return value is the smaller of and the last index position in this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 搜索从 `startIndex` 字符位置开始，并向后翻，直到找到了 `value` 或检查了第一个字符位置。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position and proceeds backward until either `value` is found or the first character position has been examined. 例如，如果 `startIndex` 为-1，则该方法会搜索字符串中最后一个字符的每个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches every character from the last character in the string to the beginning. `comparisonType` 参数通过使用区分大小写或不区分大小写的搜索以及使用 word 或序号比较规则，指定搜索使用当前或固定区域性的 `value` 参数。The `comparisonType` parameter specifies to search for the `value` parameter using the current or invariant culture, using a case-sensitive or case-insensitive search, and using word or ordinal comparison rules. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的三个重载，该方法使用 枚举的不同值在另一个字符串内查找字符串的最后一个匹配项。The following example demonstrates three overloads of the method that find the last occurrence of a string within another string using different values of the enumeration. [!code-csharp[system.string.LastIndexOfCmp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.LastIndexOfCmp/cs/liocmp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.string.LastIndexOfCmp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.string.LastIndexOfCmp/vb/liocmp.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 当前实例不等于 ，并且 小于零或大于当前实例的长度。

span.span: The current instance does not equal , and is less than zero or greater than the length of the current instance.
-or-

exception.span: 当前实例等于 ，并且 小于-1 或大于零。

span.span: The current instance equals , and is less than -1 or greater than zero.
is not a valid value.

para.span: 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 ，这是搜索开始处的字符位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找软连字符（U + 00AD）后跟 "m" 的位置，以两个字符串中的最后一个 "m" 开头。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m", starting with the final "m" in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，则在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，所以当执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法将返回字符串中的 "m" 的索引。

span.span: If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 注意对于第一个字符串，包含软连字符后跟“m”，该方法无法返回该软连字符的索引，而是返回“m”的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m".

para.span: 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 也就是说，字符串中的第一个字符位于索引零，最后一个字符位于 -1。That is, the first character in the string is at index zero and the last is at - 1. 搜索从 `startIndex` 字符位置开始，直到找到 `value` 或 `count` 字符位置已被检查时向后移动。The search begins at the `startIndex` character position and proceeds backward until either `value` is found or `count` character positions have been examined. 例如，如果 `startIndex` 为-1，则该方法将向后搜索 `count` 字符串中的最后一个字符。For example, if `startIndex` is - 1, the method searches backward `count` characters from the last character in the string. `comparisonType` 参数通过使用区分大小写或不区分大小写的搜索以及使用 word 或序号比较规则，指定搜索使用当前或固定区域性的 `value` 参数。The `comparisonType` parameter specifies to search for the `value` parameter using the current or invariant culture, using a case-sensitive or case-insensitive search, and using word or ordinal comparison rules. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的三个重载，该方法使用 枚举的不同值在另一个字符串内查找字符串的最后一个匹配项。The following example demonstrates three overloads of the method that find the last occurrence of a string within another string using different values of the enumeration. para.span: 字符集包括可忽略字符，在执行语言性的或区分区域性的比较时该字符不被考虑。

span.span: Character sets include ignorable characters, which are characters that are not considered when performing a linguistic or culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 在区分区域性的搜索 (即，如果 不是 或 ) 中，如果 包含一个可忽略字符，则结果与移除了该字符的搜索等效。

span.span: In a culture-sensitive search (that is, if is not or ), if contains an ignorable character, the result is equivalent to searching with that character removed.

para.span: 如果 只包含一个或多个可忽略字符，则 方法始终返回 ，这是搜索开始处的字符位置。

span.span: If consists only of one or more ignorable characters, the method always returns , which is the character position at which the search begins.

para.span: 在下面的示例中， 方法用于查找软连字符（U + 00AD）后跟 "m" 的位置，而不是在两个字符串中的最后一个字符位置之前的第一个字符位置。

span.span: In the following example, the method is used to find the position of a soft hyphen (U+00AD) followed by an "m" in all but the first character position before the final "m" in two strings.

para.span: 只有一个字符串包含必需的子字符串。

span.span: Only one of the strings contains the required substring.

para.span: 如果该示例在 [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] 或更高版本上运行，则在这两种情况下，因为软连字符是可忽略字符，所以当执行区分区域性的比较时，该方法将返回字符串中的 "m" 的索引。

span.span: If the example is run on the [!INCLUDE[netfx40_short](~/includes/netfx40-short-md.md)] or later, in both cases, because the soft hyphen is an ignorable character, the method returns the index of "m" in the string when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 但当它执行序号比较时，它只查找第一个字符串中的子字符串。

span.span: When it performs an ordinal comparison, however, it finds the substring only in the first string.

para.span: 请注意，对于包含软连字符后跟 "m" 的软连字符的第一个字符串，该方法将无法返回软连字符的索引，而是在执行区分区域性的比较时返回 "m" 的索引。

span.span: Note that in the case of the first string, which includes the soft hyphen followed by an "m", the method fails to return the index of the soft hyphen but instead returns the index of the "m" when it performs a culture-sensitive comparison.

para.span: 只有当此方法执行序号比较时，它才会在第一个字符串中返回软连字符的索引。

span.span: The method returns the index of the soft hyphen in the first string only when it performs an ordinal comparison.

span.span: The method returns -1 if the characters in the array are not found in this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public int LastIndexOfAny (char[] anyOf);

Public Function LastIndexOfAny (anyOf As Char()) As Integer
public: int LastIndexOfAny(cli::array <char> ^ anyOf);

param.name: anyOf
param.span: Unicode 字符数组，包含一个或多个要查找的字符。

span.span: A Unicode character array containing one or more characters to seek.

summary.span: 报告在 Unicode 数组中指定的一个或多个字符在此实例中的最后一个匹配项的从零开始的索引的位置。

span.span: Reports the zero-based index position of the last occurrence in this instance of one or more characters specified in a Unicode array.

returns.span: 最后一次在此实例中找到 中的任意字符的索引位置；如果未找到 中的字符，则为 -1。

span.span: The index position of the last occurrence in this instance where any character in was found; -1 if no character in was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法从该实例的最后一个字符位置开始搜索，并在开始时向后继续，直到找到 `anyOf` 中的字符或检查了第一个字符位置。This method begins searching at the last character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either a character in `anyOf` is found or the first character position has been examined. 搜索区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中，仅当字符的 Unicode 标量值相同时，才将其视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找字符串 "is" 中的任何字符在另一个字符串中的最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example finds the index of the last occurrence of any character in the string "is" within another string. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny1/CPP/lastixany1.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny1/CS/lastixany1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny1/VB/lastixany1.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法从该实例的 `startIndex` 字符位置开始搜索，并在 `anyOf` 中找到一个字符或检查了第一个字符位置之后，继续向下移动。This method begins searching at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either a character in `anyOf` is found or the first character position has been examined. 搜索区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中，仅当字符的 Unicode 标量值相同时，才将其视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找字符串 "is" 中任何字符的最后一个匹配项的索引，该字符串位于另一个字符串的子字符串中。The following example finds the index of the last occurrence of any character in the string "is" within a substring of another string. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny2/CPP/lastixany2.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny2/CS/lastixany2.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny2/VB/lastixany2.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引编号从0开始。Index numbering starts from zero. 此方法从该实例的 `startIndex` 字符位置开始搜索，并在 `anyOf` 中找到一个字符或已检查 `count` 个字符位置之后，继续向下移动。This method begins searching at the `startIndex` character position of this instance and proceeds backward toward the beginning until either a character in `anyOf` is found or `count` character positions have been examined. 搜索区分大小写。The search is case-sensitive. 此方法执行序号（不区分区域性）搜索，其中，仅当字符的 Unicode 标量值相同时，才将其视为等效于另一个字符。This method performs an ordinal (culture-insensitive) search, where a character is considered equivalent to another character only if their Unicode scalar values are the same. 若要执行区分区域性的搜索，请使用 方法，在此方法中，表示预构成字符的 Unicode 标量值（如连字 "Æ" （U + 00C6））可能被视为等效于正确序列（如 "AE" （U + 0041，U + 0045）中的任何匹配项，具体取决于区域性。To perform a culture-sensitive search, use the method, where a Unicode scalar value representing a precomposed character, such as the ligature "Æ" (U+00C6), might be considered equivalent to any occurrence of the character's components in the correct sequence, such as "AE" (U+0041, U+0045), depending on the culture. ## Examples 下面的示例查找字符串 "帮助" 中的任意字符在另一个字符串的子字符串中的最后一个匹配项的索引。The following example finds the index of the last occurrence of any character in the string "aid" within a substring of another string. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny3/CPP/lastixany3.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny3/CS/lastixany3.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.LastIndexOfAny3/VB/lastixany3.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回此实例中 对象的数目，而不是 Unicode 字符的数目。The property returns the number of objects in this instance, not the number of Unicode characters. 原因是 Unicode 字符可能由多个 表示。The reason is that a Unicode character might be represented by more than one . 使用 类来处理每个 Unicode 字符，而不是每个 。Use the class to work with each Unicode character instead of each . 在某些语言中，如 C 和C++，null 字符指示字符串的末尾。In some languages, such as C and C++, a null character indicates the end of a string. 在 .NET 中，可以在字符串中嵌入空字符。In .NET, a null character can be embedded in a string. 如果字符串中包含一个或多个 null 字符，则它们将包含在总字符串的长度中。When a string includes one or more null characters, they are included in the length of the total string. 例如，在下面的字符串中，子字符串 "abc" 和 "def" 由 null 字符分隔。For example, in the following string, the substrings "abc" and "def" are separated by a null character. 属性返回7，这表示它包含六个字母字符以及 null 字符。The property returns 7, which indicates that it includes the six alphabetic characters as well as the null character. [!code-cpp[System.String.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Class/cpp/system.string.class.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp-interactive[System.String.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Class/cs/System.String.Class.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.String.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Class/vb/System.String.Class.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 的属性。The following example demonstrates the property. summary.span: 返回一个新字符串，其文本值与此字符串相同，但其二进制表示形式符合 Unicode 范式 C。

span.span: Returns a new string whose textual value is the same as this string, but whose binary representation is in Unicode normalization form C.

returns.span: 一个新的规范化字符串，其文本值与此字符串相同，但其二进制表示形式符合范式 C。

span.span: A new, normalized string whose textual value is the same as this string, but whose binary representation is in normalization form C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 Unicode 字符具有多个等效的二进制表示形式，其中包含组合和/或复合 Unicode 字符的集合。Some Unicode characters have multiple equivalent binary representations consisting of sets of combining and/or composite Unicode characters. 例如，以下任何代码点都可以表示字母 "ắ"：For example, any of the following code points can represent the letter "ắ": - U+1EAFU+1EAF - U+0103 U+0301U+0103 U+0301 - U+0061 U+0306 U+0301U+0061 U+0306 U+0301 单个字符存在多个表示形式会使搜索、排序、匹配和其他操作复杂化。The existence of multiple representations for a single character complicates searching, sorting, matching, and other operations. Unicode 标准定义了一个名为规范化的进程，该进程在给定任何等效的二进制表示形式的字符时返回一个二进制表示形式。The Unicode standard defines a process called normalization that returns one binary representation when given any of the equivalent binary representations of a character. 可以通过多个算法（称为标准化形式）来执行规范化，它们遵循不同的规则。Normalization can be performed with several algorithms, called normalization forms, that obey different rules. .NET 支持由 Unicode 标准定义的四种范式（C、D、GLM-KC-QNW 和 KD）。.NET supports the four normalization forms (C, D, KC, and KD) that are defined by the Unicode standard. 如果两个字符串用同一范式表示，则可以使用序号比较对它们进行比较。When two strings are represented in the same normalization form, they can be compared by using ordinal comparison. 若要规范化和比较两个字符串，请执行以下操作：To normalize and compare two strings, do the following: 1. 获取要从输入源（如文件或用户输入设备）进行比较的字符串。Obtain the strings to be compared from an input source, such as a file or a user input device. 2. 调用 方法，将字符串规范化为范式 C。Call the method to normalize the strings to normalization form C. 3. 若要比较两个字符串，请调用支持序号字符串比较的方法，例如 方法，并提供 或 的值作为 参数。To compare two strings, call a method that supports ordinal string comparison, such as the method, and supply a value of or as the argument. 若要对规范化字符串数组进行排序，请将 或 的 `comparer` 值传递到 的适当重载。To sort an array of normalized strings, pass a `comparer` value of or to an appropriate overload of . 4. 根据上一步指示的顺序，在已排序的输出中发出字符串。Emit the strings in the sorted output based on the order indicated by the previous step. 有关支持的 Unicode 范式的说明，请参阅 。For a description of supported Unicode normalization forms, see . ## Examples 下面的示例将一个字符串规范化为四个范式中的每一个，确认该字符串已规范化为指定范式，然后列出规范化字符串中的码位。The following example normalizes a string to each of four normalization forms, confirms the string was normalized to the specified normalization form, then lists the code points in the normalized string. [!code-cpp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CPP/norm.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CS/norm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/VB/norm.vb#1)]

para.span: 因此，如果字符串包含非规范化字符后跟无效的 Unicode 字符，则 方法将引发 ，不过 返回 。

span.span: Therefore, if a string contains non-normalized characters followed by invalid Unicode characters, the method will throw an although returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 Unicode 字符具有多个等效的二进制表示形式，其中包含组合和/或复合 Unicode 字符的集合。Some Unicode characters have multiple equivalent binary representations consisting of sets of combining and/or composite Unicode characters. 单个字符存在多个表示形式会使搜索、排序、匹配和其他操作复杂化。The existence of multiple representations for a single character complicates searching, sorting, matching, and other operations. Unicode 标准定义了一个名为规范化的进程，该进程在给定任何等效的二进制表示形式的字符时返回一个二进制表示形式。The Unicode standard defines a process called normalization that returns one binary representation when given any of the equivalent binary representations of a character. 可以通过多个算法（称为标准化形式）来执行规范化，它们遵循不同的规则。Normalization can be performed with several algorithms, called normalization forms, that obey different rules. .NET 支持由 Unicode 标准定义的四种范式（C、D、GLM-KC-QNW 和 KD）。.NET supports the four normalization forms (C, D, KC, and KD) that are defined by the Unicode standard. 如果两个字符串用同一范式表示，则可以使用序号比较对它们进行比较。When two strings are represented in the same normalization form, they can be compared by using ordinal comparison. 若要规范化和比较两个字符串，请执行以下操作：To normalize and compare two strings, do the following: 1. 获取要从输入源（如文件或用户输入设备）进行比较的字符串。Obtain the strings to be compared from an input source, such as a file or a user input device. 2. 调用 方法，将字符串规范化为指定的范式。Call the method to normalize the strings to a specified normalization form. 3. 若要比较两个字符串，请调用支持序号字符串比较的方法，例如 方法，并提供 或 的值作为 参数。To compare two strings, call a method that supports ordinal string comparison, such as the method, and supply a value of or as the argument. 若要对规范化字符串数组进行排序，请将 或 的 `comparer` 值传递到 的适当重载。To sort an array of normalized strings, pass a `comparer` value of or to an appropriate overload of . 4. 根据上一步指示的顺序，在已排序的输出中发出字符串。Emit the strings in the sorted output based on the order indicated by the previous step. 有关支持的 Unicode 范式的说明，请参阅 。For a description of supported Unicode normalization forms, see . ## Examples 下面的示例将一个字符串规范化为四个范式中的每一个，确认该字符串已规范化为指定范式，然后列出规范化字符串中的码位。The following example normalizes a string to each of four normalization forms, confirms the string was normalized to the specified normalization form, then lists the code points in the normalized string. [!code-cpp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CPP/norm.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/CS/norm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[string.normalize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/string.normalize/VB/norm.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法定义 类的相等运算符的运算。The method defines the operation of the equality operator for the class. 它将启用示例部分中所示的代码。It enables code such as that shown in the Example section. 运算符反过来调用静态 方法，该方法执行序号（区分大小写和不区分区域性）比较。The operator, in turn, calls the static method, which performs an ordinal (case-sensitive and culture-insensitive) comparison. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 编译器不会将相等运算符解析为对 方法的调用。The Visual Basic compiler does not resolve the equality operator as a call to the method. 相反，相等运算符包装对 方法的调用。Instead, the equality operator wraps a call to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了相等运算符。The following example demonstrates the equality operator. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Equality/CPP/equalityop.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.String.Equality/CS/equalityop.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1":::
